Life is not a fairy tale. if you lose your shoe at midnight - I can't bring you back your shoe, but I can offer you my company

Safety is no question of gender. Our Bodies our Streets.

Feel empowered and go with the Flock

90%

women feel unsafe in public spaces

71%

experienced sexual harassment in a public space

5%

had experienced rape attempts since the age of 16

81%

of women restrict their behaviours due to the fear

Maybe one person can’t change the world,
but two - sure can!
Tell street harassment to Flock Off

Community

We believe in the power of community. Flock Off is a community space for Women and Non-binary people to share their frustration and despair at the senseless violence we continue to see against us as we simply try to walk home at night.

Technology for good

We believe in using technology for good. Love it or hate it, technology is an integral part of our daily lives. Smart phones are becoming more affordable and accessible, and we believe that this provides a unique opportunity to help change how safe we feel on our streets.

Global?

We believe in in embracing globalisation. Our international team come from multiple countries with diverse career backgrounds, but we are united by a shared feeling of despair at seeing the same stories of rape, violence and harassment trending in each of our countries. This is an issue that affects us ALL, and that is why we must work together to solve it.

Equality?

We believe in Co-operation. Just like Flock Off is about ordinary women and non-binary people (you and me), taking the power back into our own hands- it is also for businesses who care about their female and N-B customers. We can’t do this alone. We need us all to come together if we are to make lasting change for our children and our children’s children.

A safer way home · App tailored for our community not a crowd

In a world where safety levels defer to one's gender, for FLINTA* became a standard to adopt fearful and avoidant behaviours and use technologies that alert relatives or authorities once an accident has happened. Is this a status quo you want to pursue? Then read no further...

At FLOCK, we believe that this is incorrect. It is time to challenge and fix the status quo. We want to put the power back in individual hands who wish to make a difference. FLOCK APP strives to build an empowered community, erase the fear from our users and bring them home safely. WARNING: A new friendship may form.

Join the Flock to keep up with the events and do not forget to check the box if you would like to get early access to an app and contribute with the feedback.

Get Empowered
and and blah blah blah blah

"I always have this worst-case scenario in my head: what if?"
- Verena
"If I have an uncomfortable feeling because someone is walking behind me, I stop and let the person pass. That way I can regain control over the situation."
- Johanna
"As soon as I get off the train, I take my key in my hand so that I feel safer - even during the day. Everyone should behave in a way that does not intimidate other people!"
- Melanie
"I wish my fear would be taken seriously and ridiculed less."
- Annina
"I don't want to accept this fear anymore. It's time to free myself from powerlessness and make a change!"
- Svenja
"We're living in the 21 Century - it is unacceptable that FLINTA feel like this! I don't want to have my freedom taken away!"
- Kati
